content: stitches* repeat around 60 round 29-30 1 single_crochet in every stitch 60 fasten_off and weave in loose ends if modifications were necessary to make the diameter smaller refer to the medium size section for instructions starting with the number of stiches of your last row if modifications were necessary to increase the diameter start reducing the size of the hat by the number of stiches in your last row for example if your last row had 110 stiches the instructions for the first round odd number would be 1 single_crochet in every stitch 110 followed by *decrease 1 single_crochet in 9 stitches* repeat around 100 for the next even number round if starting with 120 stitches instructions for the first even number round would be *decrease 1 single_crochet in 10 stitches* repeat around 110 etc part three all sizes optional loop style  with a small amount of yarn leave a long tail to connect to hat and chain 8  slip_stitch in first chain to create a loop leave a long tail and cut yarn  with a needle insert loop into centre of hat secure two loose ends on the inside and weave in ends le cabillou stalk style  with a small amount of yarn leave a long tail to connect to hat and chain 8  slip_stitch in second chain from hook and each of the remain six chains leave a long tail and cut yarn  with a neele insert stalk into centre of hat secure the two loose end in the inside and weave in ends you are welcome to use this pattern to make and sell hats but please don t claim my pictures as yours please contact me if you have any questions or notice an error i hope you enjoy this pattern and keep on crafting regards jen savoie jen savoie65@gmail com
